## Markdown and Quarto Formatting

### Writing about code in Quarto documents

When writing about code in prose sections of quarto documents, 
use backticks to apply a code style:
for example, `dplyr::mutate()`.
When talking about packages,
use plain text with hyperlinks to the package website.
For example: [dplyr](https://dplyr.tidyverse.org/).
